main.name: Dominique Thomas
main.description: I'm focused on Python development creating better software and systems for companies in need. I believe in honesty, clean code, and always putting in 100%
main.bio:
I watch tons of movies, I play action & adventure videogames, and I love to experience new adventures. I'm also currently saving to purchase my first property. 
From basic puzzles to advanced math, I have always had an immense fascination to solve problems. When I was introduced to computer science in high school, it seemed natural, and I loved it! Today I feel an obligation to imaginatively contribute technology that the world can use.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

work.title: Founder / Software Developer
work.description: • Develop automation processes for receiving, storing, testing, and sending various types of information. • Analyze user needs and then design, test, and develop project software to meet those needs. • Compiling and assessing user feedback to improve software performance and reliability.

work.title: Operations / Developer
work.description: • Supervise the activities of workers engaged in receiving, storing, testing, and shipping products or materials. • Plan, develop, and implement warehouse safety programs and activities. • Develop and implement efficient plans for storage and distribution activities that emphasizes technological solutions for sustainability as well as scalability.

projects.title: Amazing Movies! Hangman Edition
projects.category: Python game script played interacting with Windows CMD

testimonials.text: No problem can be solved from the same level of conscoiusness that created it.
First comes thought; then organization of that thought, into ideas and plans; then transformation of those plans into reality. The beginning, as you will observe, is in your imagination.
